participant_1.name: Skylar
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and introspective, with a deep love for animals and nature.
participant_1.background: the holidays make me depressed. i spend my time bird watching with my cats. my age is too old to say. i'm an animal activist. i have rainbow hair.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: playful and imaginative, with a strong bond to her pets and a whimsical outlook on life.
participant_2.background: i have a pet turtle. i like to play with my dolls. i don't pick up my toys. my best friend lives next door.
